name: A Journey to Home
description:
A Journey To Home 

This mischievous little fuzz ball needs your help getting back home to his nest where his mom is waiting. As they continuously migrate across different biomes and even outer space Bappy seems to get carried away with his surroundings and ends up getting left behind. No need to fret, you're here to help get Bappy back home to his mom before dinner time... Bappy's favorite meal of the day. 

This Platform game is a minimalist book illustration world and is meant to create a fun and calming atmosphere for everyone to enjoy. 

CREDITS:

All Art except for the character asset was made by me. 

Character asset made by Illustaktion Unity Asset Store (FurBall 2D V1.2 mobile optimized)

Code provided by Micheal Baker
